title: The Favorites Sports Betting Podcast - Last Minute NFL Draft Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites Sports Betting Podcast - Last Minute NFL Draft Bets
description:
With the first pick in the 2022 NFL Draft, the Jacksonville Jaguars are practically on the clock! Action Network Chief Content Officer Chad Millman returns with his closest companion Simon Hunter to discuss all their last-minute bets for this Las Vegas spectacle Thursday night, along with all the intrigue and posturing that goes along with it! Together they speed through some picks and mock drafting advice, and get you ready to profit all Draft long. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
